settings.label: Product details page
settings.comment: IMPORTANT!:For attributes to appear on the lists, you need to configure the value "Use To Create Configurable Product" to Yes in Catalog > Attributes > Manage Attributes.

jquery.label: Include jQuery
jquery.comment: If your theme or another extension already includes jQuery, set to No.

attributes.label: Display Swatches
attributes.comment:
Configurable attributes to display as SWATCHES in the product details page.
IMPORTANT!: An attribute should be selected only in one of the lists: "Display Swatches" , "Display Child Products Images" or "Labels", the same attribute cannot be selected in more than one list.

childproducts.label: Display Child Products Images
childproducts.comment:
Display CHIlD PRODUCTS as swatches options in the product details page, instead of color swatches or text labels.
IMPORTANT!: An attribute should be selected only in one of the lists: "Display Swatches" , "Display Child Products Images" or "Labels", the same attribute cannot be selected in more than one list.

labels.label: Labels
labels.comment:
Configurable attributes to display as LABELS instead of select boxes in the product details page.
IMPORTANT!: An attribute should be selected only in one of the lists: "Display Swatches" , "Display Child Products Images" or "Labels", the same attribute cannot be selected in more than one list.

hideselect.label: Hide Select
hideselect.comment: Hide the default SELECT option and display only the swatches or labels in the product details page.

defaultselect.label: Default option
defaultselect.comment: Method to preselect a configurable option.

imageattribute.label: Gallery attribute
imageattribute.comment: Enter the code of the image attribute used to choose the default options( e.g. : image, thumbnail, small_image ). You can also use a custom image attribute created in Catalog > Attributes > Manage Attributes

chained_preselect.label: Chained Preselection
chained_preselect.comment: Preselect first available option in chained selectors.

switchimage.label: Switch Images
switchimage.comment: Change the main image when an option is chosen for this attributes.

switchgallery.label: Switch Gallery
switchgallery.comment: Display only gallery images associated to the selected option.If "No" is selected, all the gallery images will stay visible.

gallery_swatches.label: Gallery as swatches
gallery_swatches.comment: Use images from the product gallery as swatches, when the user clicks on an image on the products gallery, the corresponding option will be selected.

gallerytitle.label: Gallery Title
gallerytitle.comment: Empty to hide the gallery title

images.label: Load child product gallery
images.comment: Choose whether to display images from the product gallery (faster) or from the child products.

exclude_parent_images.label: Exclude parent images
exclude_parent_images.comment: Use only images from child products and exclude the parent product images from the product images gallery.

outofstock.label: Show out of stock options
outofstock.comment: Will show options that are out of stock, with the options greyed out.

css_class.label: Swatches appearance
css_class.comment: Select the swatches style on the product details page

swatch_width.label: Swatches width
swatch_width.comment: Swatches width on the configurable product options block.

swatch_height.label: Swatches height
swatch_height.comment: Swatches height on the configurable product options block.

small_image_width.label: Gallery thumbs width
small_image_width.comment: Width for images on the more-views block below the main product image.

small_image_height.label: Gallery thumbs height
small_image_height.comment: Height for images on the more-views block below the main product image..

hide_gallery.label: Hide single image gallery
hide_gallery.comment: Hide product images gallery or carousel when there is only one image available.

reload_attributes.label: Reload Attribute
reload_attributes.comment:
Only attributes with value "Used in Product Listing" are displayed.
In order to update the attribute value on the product page after the options have been chosen, create an element with id='swatches-update-attribute-[attribute_code]'. e.g.:
<div id="swatches-update-attribute-description"></div>

use_child_product_price.label: Price based on simple product
use_child_product_price.comment: The final price of the configurable product is the price of the child product based on the options selection.

productlist.label: Product List
productlist.comment: Extension settings for products list: category pages and search results

attributes.label: Swatches in Products List
attributes.comment:
Configurable attribute to display as SWATCHES in the products list page.
IMPORTANT!: you need to configure the value "Use To Create Configurable Product" to Yes in Catalog > Attributes > Manage Attributes.

mode.label: Swatches in Products List Mode
mode.comment: Display swatches or pictures of the child products.

event.label: Swatch behaviour
event.comment:
Switch thumbnails based on the swatch selection:
- On click
- On hover event (click goes to product page ) .

images.label: Images source object
images.comment: Choose whether to display images from the product gallery (faster) or from the child products.

availability.label: Show availability list
availability.comment:
Configurable attribute to display as a LIST of available options, without switching images.
IMPORTANT!: you need to configure the value "Use To Create Configurable Product" to Yes in Catalog > Attributes > Manage Attributes.

alternate_image_source.label: Alternate Image Attribute
alternate_image_source.comment: To show and alternate image on product image hover, enter the attribute code of the gallery image to be used as alternate image. You need to create first a product attribute of type "image", and then enter the code here. Empty to not use this effect.

thumbs.label: Display thumbnails
thumbs.comment: Show thumbnails in popup, below main image

buttons.label: Display controls
buttons.comment: Show controls above the enlarged image: prev, next, pause, play

etalage.label: Etalage Plugin
etalage.comment:
IMPORTANT!:
- Images sizes are set above in the "Product details page" section. "Main image" and "Enlarged image" should have the same ration width/height.
- Disable the etalage gallery to use cloudzoom and bxslider.

enabled.label: Enable Etalage
enabled.comment: By setting this to "Yes" the cloudzoom and bxslider plugins will be disabled and their settings ignored

disable_zoom.label: Disable zoom
disable_zoom.comment: Display gallery and thumbs only without zoom functionality.

zoom_area_width.label: Zoom area width
zoom_area_width.comment: Width of the zoomed image frame (including borders, padding) (value in pixels)

zoom_area_height.label: Zoom area height
zoom_area_height.comment: Height of the zoomed image frame (including borders, padding) (value in pixels / 'justify' = automatic (height of large thumb + small thumbs))

small_thumbs.label: Small thumbs
small_thumbs.comment: How many small thumbnails will be visible underneath the large thumbnail(minimum of 3)

smallthumbs_position.label: Small thumbs position
smallthumbs_position.comment: Where to position the row of small thumbnails ('top'/'bottom'/'left'/'right')

align.label: Align
align.comment: Align of the Etalage container. The zoom area will appear on the opposite side ('left'/'right')

use_porto_icons.label: Use porto icons
use_porto_icons.comment: Use porto glyphicons. Porto theme must be enabled.

position.label: Carousel Gallery Position
position.comment: For the vertical carousel, the width is calculated using the radion: thumbnail_width / main_image_width

min_items.label: Min Number of Items
min_items.comment:
The minimum number of slides to be shown. Slides will be sized down if carousel becomes smaller than the original size.
Useful for responsive themes when the number of items in the carousel accomodates based on the page width.
For vertical carousels or non-responsive themes, the same values for minimum and maximum.

max_items.label: Max Number of Items
max_items.comment:
The maximum number of slides to be shown. Slides will be sized up if carousel becomes larger than the original size.
Useful for responsive themes when the number of items in the carousel accomodates based on the page width.
For vertical carousels or non-responsive themes, the same values for minimum and maximum.

move_items.label: Move Slides
move_items.comment: The number of slides to move on transition. This value must be >= minSlides, and <= maxSlides. If zero (default), the number of fully-visible slides will be used.

layerednavigation.label: Layered Navigation
layerednavigation.comment: IMPORTANT!: you need to configure the value "Use In Layered Navigation" to Yes in Catalog > Attributes > Manage Attributes.

attributes.label: Links and Swatches
attributes.comment: Configurable attributes to display as SWATCHES in the layered navigation.

hidelabel.label: Show swatches without labels
hidelabel.comment: Configurable attributes to display as SWATCHES in the layered navigation without any text label.

label.label: Labels only
label.comment: Configurable attributes to display as LABELS ( inline buttons ) in the layered navigation.

switchimages.label: Switch images
switchimages.comment: Change the images in the product list based on the option selected in the layered navigation if the attribute is used to display swatches.

overrideimage.label: Override images in cart
overrideimage.comment:
Display images from the parent product gallery based on the attributes selection and based on the attributes chosen in the "Switch Image" field, instead of showing the child/parent product thumbnail (Magento default) .
Important: Make sure the option Checkout > Shopping Cart > Configurable Product Image is "Product Thumbnail Itself"
